title: Quality KPI Dashboard
currentPhase: Modular development of each QE Data Center KPI using the same structure: SharePoint data list, connected Power BI report, Power Apps main section and update form, plus optional Power Automate flows.
concept: An Interactive Dashboard where show the most important KPI status to KPI by charts

timeline.currentPhase: Modular development of each QE Data Center KPI using the same structure: SharePoint data list, connected Power BI report, Power Apps main section and update form, plus optional Power Automate flows.
